            <entry>cahi1:data_5c240539d699932fbda18039fc5628b8c860a426</entry>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction between the car wheel and the road during driving, braking and skidding</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion zwischen dem Autorad und der Straße 
während des Antreibens, des Bremsens und des Rutschens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement entre la roue de voiture et la route 
pendant piloter, freiner et ensaboter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção entre a roda de carro e a estrada 
durante dirigir, frear e derrapar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito fra la rotella di automobile e la strada 
durante l'azionamento, il frenaggio e slittare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή μεταξύ της ρόδας αυτοκινήτων και του δρόμου 
κατά τη διάρκεια της οδήγησης, του φρεναρίσματος και της 
ολίσθησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fricción entre la rueda de coche y el camino 
durante conducir, frenar y patinarse</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the effect of friction between the car wheel and the road on the car driving along (A), during braking (B) and during skidding (C).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">driving</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">road</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">braking force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">car wheels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gripping force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">skidding</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Effekt der Friktion 
zwischen dem Autorad und der Straße auf dem Autoantreiben entlang 
(a), während bremsenden (b) und während rutschenden (c).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'effet du frottement 
entre la roue de voiture et la route sur piloter de voiture le long de
(a), pendant (b) freinant et pendant (c) d'ensabotage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o efeito da fricção 
entre a roda de carro e a estrada em dirigir de carro ao longo de (a),
durante (B) freando e durante (c) derrapando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'effetto di attrito 
fra la rotella di automobile e la strada sulla guida di veicoli lungo 
(a), durante il (B) di frenaggio e durante il (c) slittante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την επίδραση της τριβής 
μεταξύ της ρόδας αυτοκινήτων και του δρόμου στην οδήγηση 
αυτοκινήτων κατά μήκος (A), κατά τη διάρκεια του 
φρεναρίσματος (B) και κατά τη διάρκεια της ολίσθησης (C).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el efecto de la 
fricción entre la rueda de coche y el camino en conducir de coche a 
lo largo de (a), durante (b) que frena y durante (c) que se patina.</string>
          </description>
